intro.name: Phan Hoang Tuan
intro.bio: Hello, I'm Tuan - Fresher PHP Laravel Developer. Nice to meet you at my website.

about.name: Phan Hoang Tuan
about.bio: I'm a PHP developer with a strong focus on backend development using Laravel, MySQL and API RESTful. I enjoy building scalable web applications and writing clean, maintainable code. I'm always eager to learn new technologies and contribute to meaningful projects. My goal is to grow into a well-rounded backend engineer.

skills.title: What I do
skills.tech: I have over 6 months of hands-on experience interning at startups focusing on PHP Laravel, RESTful APIs, and MySQL. Here is a quick overview of the skill set and key technologies I use. Want to find out more about my experience? Check out my

courseList.title: JavaScript Course - Udemy (by Jonas Schmedtmann)
points: Learned JavaScript from basic to advanced: variables, functions, arrays, objects, and the DOM.
Worked with asynchronous JavaScript (Promises, async/await, fetch API).
Understood and applied Object-Oriented Programming (constructor functions, classes, inheritance).
Practiced with multiple mini-projects and real-world exercises.

tasks: Optimized the backend of a learning system using Laravel APIs.
Worked with PostgreSQL, optimized the complex queries.
Tested APIs with Postman, fixed 50% of logical errors.
Proposed and implemented drag-and-drop UI using VueJS.
Used GitHub, GitLab for version control in the team.
Collaborated on the web project design and user flow.
Designed the UI with Blade Template, Bootstrap, jQuery.
Used GitHub and Docker for version and environment management.
Explored AI Prompt Engineering to enhance AI features.
